source.title: Subagents - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Subagents for task delegation: YAML frontmatter configuration, file locations, tools and model selection, built-in agents (general-purpose, plan, explore), plugin agents, /agents command, chaining, resumable sessions, and example templates.

source.title: Plugins - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin system for extending Claude Code with custom commands, agents, Skills, hooks, and MCP servers. Covers plugin creation, marketplace management, installation, local testing, debugging, team distribution, and directory structure.

source.title: Agent Skills - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Model-invoked Agent Skills extending Claude capabilities: SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter, personal and project directories, plugin skills, allowed-tools restrictions, discovery, testing, debugging, team sharing via git, troubleshooting conflicts, and multi-file examples.

source.title: Skill authoring best practices - Claude Docs
source.description: Skill authoring best practices: conciseness principles, naming conventions, description writing, progressive disclosure patterns, workflows and feedback loops, utility scripts, validation, code execution environment, MCP tool references, and evaluation-driven development.

source.title: Output Styles - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Output styles for adapting Claude Code: built-in styles (default, explanatory, learning), custom Markdown frontmatter creation, keep-coding-instructions option, /output-style command switching, and comparisons to CLAUDE.md, agents, and slash commands.

source.title: Get started with Claude Code hooks - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Hook lifecycle events (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, Notification, Stop, Session), matcher configuration, practical examples for command logging, auto-formatting TypeScript and markdown, desktop notifications, and file protection with security guidelines.

source.title: Headless mode - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Headless mode for running Claude Code programmatically via CLI scripts and automation. Covers --print flag, output formats (text, JSON, stream-json), input formats, multi-turn conversations, session resumption, and agent integration examples.

source.title: Plugin marketplaces - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin marketplaces for distributing Claude Code extensions: /plugin marketplace commands, GitHub/Git/local sources, marketplace.json schema, plugin entries with component configuration (commands, agents, hooks, mcpServers), strict mode, extraKnownMarketplaces for teams, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Plugins reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin technical reference: five component types (commands, agents, skills, hooks with 10 event types, MCP servers), plugin.json manifest schema, path behaviour rules, directory layout, CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT variable, and debugging troubleshooting.

source.title: Slash commands - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Built-in commands reference, custom slash command creation in project and personal directories, arguments, bash execution, file references, frontmatter options, plugin commands, MCP slash commands, SlashCommand tool permissions, and skills comparison.

source.title: Use Claude Code with Chrome (beta) - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Chrome browser integration via Claude in Chrome extension enabling terminal-to-browser automation including navigation, clicking, typing, form filling, console log reading, tab management, GIF recording, and multi-site workflows.

source.title: CLI reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: CLI commands for interactive REPL, piped queries, session continuation, CLI flags for configuration including model selection, tools, system prompts, agents, MCP servers, permission modes, output formats, and debugging options.

source.title: Common workflows - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Common workflows including codebase exploration, bug fixing, refactoring, subagents, Plan Mode, test creation, pull requests, documentation, image analysis, extended thinking, session resumption, Git worktrees, Unix piping, and custom slash commands.

source.title: Discover and install prebuilt plugins through marketplaces - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Plugin marketplace system for discovering, installing, and managing plugins from official Anthropic and third-party sources, including LSP code intelligence plugins, external service integrations, development workflow tools, and output styles.

source.title: Claude Code GitHub Actions - Claude Code Docs
source.description: GitHub Actions integration with @claude mentions, PR automation, slash commands, CLAUDE.md configuration, AWS Bedrock and Google Vertex AI setup, OIDC authentication, custom GitHub Apps, workflow triggers, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Claude Code GitLab CI/CD - Claude Code Docs
source.description: GitLab CI/CD integration for Claude Code including job configuration, AWS Bedrock and Google Vertex AI setup with OIDC/WIF authentication, MR automation, security best practices, and troubleshooting.

source.title: Hooks reference - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Hook events (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, Stop, SubagentStop, SessionStart, SessionEnd, UserPromptSubmit, Notification, PreCompact, PermissionRequest), configuration structure, matchers, input/output schemas, JSON decision control, prompt-based hooks, MCP tool integration, and debugging.

source.title: Connect Claude Code to tools via MCP - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server installation and configuration including transport types (HTTP, SSE, stdio), installation scopes (local, project, user), plugin servers, OAuth authentication, resources, prompts as commands, and enterprise controls.

source.title: Optimize your terminal setup - Claude Code Docs
source.description: Terminal configuration including themes, line break shortcuts (Shift+Enter, Option+Enter), iTerm2 and VS Code notification setup, handling large inputs, and Vim mode keybindings for navigation and editing.
